title: Attribution to Turner and Romantic influence

content.question: Correctly attribute the work shown to the nineteenth-century artist who created it. Using specific visual evidence, justify your attribution by describing at least two relevant similarities between the work shown and another work by the same artist. Using specific evidence, explain at least two ways in which the work was influenced by Romanticism.

frqParts.text: Correctly attribute the work shown to the nineteenth-century artist who created it. Using specific visual evidence, justify your attribution by describing at least two relevant similarities between the work shown and another work by the same artist. Using specific evidence, explain at least two ways in which the work was influenced by Romanticism.

topic.text: 4.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
